nodes.text: Dyne 577 radial atomizer engines were a variant of sublight engines that were fitted and utilised onboard the starships of the Judicial Forces, the peacekeeping entity of the Galactic Republic's Department of Justice. In total, three thrusters of this model were integrated into Consular-class space cruisers.

These robust and powerful engines served as the primary propulsion system for the starships of the Republic Diplomatic Fleet, which consisted of Consular-class space cruisers, such as the Radiant VII. The thrusters could propel Republic cruisers at great velocities within atmosphere, allowing the vessels to reach 900km/h.
